Job.Description: Will help the doctor and heal sick people.

GainTrait.Text: ${name} has been employed in the clinic for so long, she has become a Doctor.
Helping so many people has made ${name} more Compassionate.

Messages.Message:
She must be the perfect nurse, patients go on and on about her and always come to see her when she works.
Just the sight of ${name} brings happiness to the patients. She is a blessing to the entire ward. Today the knowledge and swift reaction from ${name} saved a patient's life! She was doing her routine with a wide, beautiful smile and humming a pleasant tune. Her work is her life. She finds fulfillment in every day working in the clinic. She spent her day supervising new nurses, showing them how to do the work properly and answering tons of questions.

She's unbelievable at this and is always getting praised for her work by the patients.
${name} is good at her work. Besides helping patients, she gave some pointers to younger, less experience coworkers. ${name} was on her feet all day long. She was really tired but also felt fulfilled. She managed to calm a patient before a major surgery. When assisting in a surgery, she knew what tool will be needed, before the surgeon called for them. ${name} is really committed to her job as a nurse. She's starting to feel enjoyment after every hard worked day.

She's good at this job and gets praised by the patients often.
She made one of the patients heart beat dangerously high, while leaning over his face to rearrange the pillow. ${name} made her rounds and spend the rest of the day chatting with other staff members. When giving medicine to the patient, ${name} noticed that the dosage for one of them was wrong. She corrected her mistake immediately. Today she was assigned to the surgery room. She learned something new. It was a busy day for ${name}, but she manage to get through it without any slip-ups.

She made a few mistakes but overall she is okay at this.
She accidentally gave a patient the wrong dosage of their drugs! Fortunately she understated them. ${name} made a mistake while changing bandages of one of her patients. The head nurse scolded her. She spent her shift following the doctor and learning more about the job. She slapped an older patient for groping her ass! Good thing that the doctor was near to help him stay alive!
When giving a sponge bath to one of male patients she accidentally aroused his manhood . Ashamed from the sight, she ran out the room! but it didn't bother her any.

She was nervous and made a few mistakes. She isn't that good at this.
When prepping her patient before a mayor surgery she described all possible bad outcomes forgetting to mentioning the low risk percentage and good sides of this treatment. ${name} took the temperature of all patients in her block with the same thermometer without sterilizing it! She got scolded today by the doctor for laughing at the patients that came in for liposuction about their weight. Being responsible for utilizing today's medical waste, ${name} just flushed them down the toilet. She spend most of her shift snoozing in the basement medical supply storage.

She was nervous and constantly making mistakes. She really isn't very good at this job. Some could say that her technique of drawing blood is the same way people play pin the tail on the donkey. Sponge bath, skinning someone alive, no difference for ${name}. ${name} covered her mouth while sneezing several times. After that she went to assist in the ongoing surgery without changing her gloves! While assisting the doctor, ${name} giggled when the patient was telling about their health problems. ${name} fainted at the first sight of blood. She wasn't helpful today.
